net.derquinse.common.meta

Class Metas.ToStringHelper<C>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.derquinse.common.meta.Metas.ToStringHelper<C>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - Containing type.
    Enclosing class:
    Metas

    public static final class Metas.ToStringHelper<C>
extends Object
    Support class for Metas.toStringHelper(C).
    Author:
    Jason Lee

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Metas.ToStringHelper<C> add(MetaFlag<? super C> flag)
      Adds a name/value pair to the formatted output based on the provided flag.
      Metas.ToStringHelper<C> add(MetaProperty<? super C,?> property)
      Adds a name/value pair to the formatted output based on the provided property.
      Metas.ToStringHelper<C> add(String name, Object value)
      Adds a name/value pair to the formatted output in name=value format.
      Metas.ToStringHelper<C> addValue(Object value)
      Adds a value to the formatted output in value format.
      String toString()
      Returns a string in the format specified by Objects.toStringHelper(Object).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public Metas.ToStringHelper<C> add(String name,
                          @Nullable
                          Object value)
        Adds a name/value pair to the formatted output in name=value format. If value is null, the string "null" is used.

      • add

        public Metas.ToStringHelper<C> add(MetaProperty<? super C,?> property)
        Adds a name/value pair to the formatted output based on the provided property.

      • add

        public Metas.ToStringHelper<C> add(MetaFlag<? super C> flag)
        Adds a name/value pair to the formatted output based on the provided flag.

      • addValue

        public Metas.ToStringHelper<C> addValue(@Nullable
                               Object value)
        Adds a value to the formatted output in value format.

        It is strongly encouraged to use add(String, Object) instead and give value a readable name.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Returns a string in the format specified by Objects.toStringHelper(Object).
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
